overview: Psychotherapist Brendan Patrick is treating closeted patient Hans Berlin, a hot, middle aged daddy who is cheating on his wife with a series of younger men. But while Brendan plays the reasonable, stable therapist by day, by night he fantasizes about hot Hans' risky life of forbidden pleasure. What latent desires does the doctor's own subconscious hold? The line between fantasy and reality becomes perilously blurred in this twisted tale of secret lust.
title: The Therapist
